extendedInfo.description: Helps you ensure that your WiFi radio will remain active when the phone is idle.When running on Cupcake (Android 1.5) and beyond, it simply acts as a toggle utility for the "Wireless Controls | Wi-Fi Settings | Menu | Advanced | Wi-Fi Sleep Policy" setting (between "When screen turns off" and "Never").

reviews.comment: Great app! 5 stars if toggle state for \"never when plugged in\" is added for Froyo. Seems like default really means \"when screen goes dim\". (droid 2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what is advertised, is free, and in my opinion, is the best app for this job...five stars! I\'m using a Droid2 for the record.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says it does, but I\'m looking for a app that can make WiFi turn off when the screen goes off. Lowest WiFi sleep policy on Evo is 15 mins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thank you!! Other apps failed. Yours keeps mine on after screen off even when I had already set sleep to never. Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to see if on or off
reviews.comment: It is very difficult to see of this is on or off. App doesn\'t open, change color, or give you a notification. There is a tiny brief pop up that is hard to read and quickly disappears. Very poor UI design.
reviews.author: Hayes Reed

reviews.comment: Works fine on my old Pandigital 7\" White Novel eBook reader that\'s been \"jailbroken\" to run as a stock Android 2.2 tablet.  Just install and forget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works fine on nexus one. Wish it would cycle all 3 modes, I prefer to keep wifi enabled when phone plugged into power.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Check out abdullah with the nice remarks. Way to go. Being friendly and positive . We\'d like to see more of that on the market specially when its free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfect on LG Optimus and appears to have no adverse effect on battery life.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My phone would always disconnect at work about 20 times a day. With this app its 0 times a day, NICE AND GREAT APP!!! TWO THUMBS UP, MOTOROLA I1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had to do a hard reset on my Moment and noticed wifi was turned off when phone was idle. Im a noob when it comes to cell phones so i downloaded this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works on samsung spica. Prevents \'leakage\' of 3g bytes when phone is idling in wifi mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thanks for this, fast way to toggle this setting, and thx that you didn\'t made it a widget (widgets \"steals\" memory). Desire froyo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic simple works, hero on cupcake saves going in to settings
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent.. i am not sure why this is not included by default. Must be application for wifi users. Suggestion : wifi over gprs should be bundled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: -Doesnt Work
reviews.comment: My WiFi still cuts off every five minutess .. DOESNT WORK ! 1Starr :(( ( Mytouch4G)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Nice effort, but doesn\'t work on Sony SK17i, but then nor do any of the others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps wifi icon, but actually drops connection anyway. Good in concept, not executed well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Working great on my x10, definitely needed this-got so tired of having apps \"phone home\"while phone was idle (esp.don\'t want to use at&t..) thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OG Furious
reviews.comment: Dont get if you have Android Optimus
reviews.author: A Google User
